Information_2_1: ^If you will, tell me where you've been.

c-0: ^Working. I don't have much time for idle chat.
^Someone died. Surely you can spare a few moments?
c-1: ^Against him? No. I didn't know him much. Poor old man.
c-2: ^Well Birger and... wait... do you think I did this? How could you say that!
^Wait, you must know these are just routine questions.

c-1: ^Routine?! This whole town is out to get me! This has farmer written all over it!

c-0: ^Well it's just... the farmers seem the most agitated right now.
^No one is blaming anyone here. I'll look into that.
